content: New Leaderboard, New Promotions! $5,000 USD Prize Poolhttps://new.betcoin.ag/og/new-leaderboard-new-promotions-5000-usd-prize-poolBetcoin introduces the new leaderboard and new promotion to celebrate the leaderboard featuring 5 different leaderboards with prizepools for each!Betcoin is please to introduce our new leaderboard interface and new promotion to accompany the new leaderboard. The new leaderboard is integrated directly into the new website and features a completely new interface, filtering functions and dynamic UI. In honor of our new leaderboard, Betcoin is announcing the New Leaderboard, New Promotions $5,000 USD Competition featuring a race to the top, casino ROI, sportsbook ROI, casino most bets and sports most bets leaderboard.This will be a one month event, split into two competitions. The first event of the competition will begin July 3, 2023 at 8PM ET and will run through July 10, 2023 at 8PM ET.The second event of the competition will begin July 24, 2023 at 8PM ET and will run through July 31, 2023 at 8PM ET.Race to the Top! - $1,300 - 1st. $800, 2nd. $300, 3rd. $200Casino ROI - $500 - 1st. $300, 2nd. 150, 3rd. $50Sports ROI - $500 - 1st. $300, 2nd. 150, 3rd. $50Casino Most Bets - $50 - 1st. $30, 2nd. $15, 3rd. $5Sports Most Bets - $50 - 1st. $30, 2nd. $15, 3rd. $5EDIT:Casino Most Bets - $100 - 1st. $60, 2nd. $30, 3rd. $10Sports Most Bets - $100 - 1st. $60, 2nd. $30, 3rd. $10

comments.body: $5,000 Leaderboard Promo - Less than 12 Hours Away!https://new.betcoin.ag/og/new-leaderboard-new-promotions-5000-usd-prize-poolOur NEW leaderboards are all warmed up and ready to start tracking your play!The top 3 players in each of our 5 leaderboard categories will share a $5,000 prize pool!The first week starts today, 3 Jul at 2000 ET and will run through 10 Jul at the same time.Payouts for this week are as follows:Race to the Top! - $1,300 - 1st. $800, 2nd. $300, 3rd. $200Casino ROI - $500 - 1st. $300, 2nd. 150, 3rd. $50Sports ROI - $500 - 1st. $300, 2nd. 150, 3rd. $50Casino Most Bets - $100 - 1st. $60, 2nd. $30, 3rd. $10Sports Most Bets - $100 - 1st. $60, 2nd. $30, 3rd. $10Track your scores here:https://new.betcoin.ag/leaderboardsThanks and best of luck to all!

Don't miss out on your chance for big Bitcoin prizes!Complete details and prize info here:https://new.betcoin.ag/og/new-leaderboard-new-promotions-5000-usd-prize-pool
